channel.title: Gustav Janssons devlog
channel.description: This blog is a try to me keep motivates and a way to see my progress on my current projects. Let’s see how it goes!

item.title: Week 15
item.description: This week I i removed the last of javascript references merged the lua branch of euphoria into master. Still a few places to clean up but I can move forward now with a better scriping engine. I am actually tempted to put all my efforts into a vertical slice of the engine so we’ll see in a week if I took action or continued cleaning up the code.

item.title: Week 14
item.description: This week I realized that lua perhaps could be a good candidate for scripting language, so I updated the lua fork to the lastest master.

item.title: Week 13
item.description: This week I started updating my script-test since I have recently found myself in need of a better scripting language. I also took the plunge and started making a small textbased game in typescript and react.

item.title: Week 12
item.description: This week I started on clang-tidying euphoria. I probably should complete the tred before gettting back to euphoria…

item.title: Week 11
item.description: This week I mostly been watching netflix but I did started to clean up my bookscript

item.title: Week 10
item.description: This week I continued to work on the book script. It’s actually getting close to completion now. A few smaller things left but the only major is only generating a ebook file from the source

item.title: Week 09
item.description: Haha. No rendering work this week. Instead I updated my infofile to more modern parsing without flex/bison and started updating my book.py script for creating e-books. That is also mostly done so I can get back to working on rendering in tred

item.title: Week 08
item.description: This week I completed my c# port and continued on input for tred. A few things left before it’s done for this round but soon I can continue working on the rendering again.

item.title: Wekk 07
item.description: This week I started porting my c# engine ‘simple engine’ from 2009 to c++.

item.title: Week 06
item.description: This week I found a opensource tracer so I started porting it to c++. I then realized I need to load js like json files and started to update my json loader.

item.title: Week 05
item.description: This week I have been working on game controller implementation. First I wrote most of one implementation and then removed that in favor of a more-code but less complex solution.

item.title: Week 04
item.description: This week I continued working on the input system. Better error handling and working fallback when a connected joystick is lost. Next up is gamepad, rumble and finally 3d rendering again.

item.title: Week 03
item.description: This week more or less nothing was implemented but I watched many GDC presentations.

item.title: Week 02
item.description: This week I continued on the Input System. Another refactoring but I think it’s finally the beginning of the end now

item.title: Week 01
item.description: This week I continued on working on the input system. Getting closer now, hopefully it will be “done” next week.
